flashcards.english: Person with lame heart is not same as person with lame leg (It is not easy to know one with ill mind)
flashcards.notes: Wisdom about hidden intentions: Physical disability (lame leg) is visible, but evil intentions (lame heart/mind) are hidden. Warns about trusting appearances. Mũthua = lame person, Ngoro = heart/mind, Kũgũrũ = leg
